name: @formatjs/intl-relativetimeformat
description: Formats JavaScript dates to relative time strings.
author: Long Ho <holevietlong@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:additional
scripts.build:additional: tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && tsc -p tsconfig.es6.json && rollup -c rollup.config.js && api-extractor run --local
scripts.jest: cross-env NODE_ICU_DATA=../../node_modules/full-icu TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.json cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest
scripts.test: npm run jest && npm run test262
